title: Remitly returns as official partner for Major League Cricket
body:
The Major League Cricket (MLC) franchise Twenty20 competition in the US has renewed its partnership with American online remittance service Remitly for a second consecutive season.

Through the deal, the company will serve as an official partner for the league’s upcoming third season.

The partnership will include exclusive promotions, fan engagement opportunities, and community-driven activations.

In January, MLC appointed Johnny Grave as its new chief executive.

He is responsible for overseeing all aspects of MLC's operations, including league expansion (it first launched in 2023), team development, and strategic partnerships.

MLC’s third season will mark a significant expansion in the US market, featuring 34 matches across three venues in Dallas, Texas; Oakland, California; and Broward County, Florida, with the league having plans to expand to more cities in the coming years.

MLC's 2025 season will begin in June.
summary:
* The MLC has renewed its partnership with Remitly for the second consecutive season, serving as an official partner for the league's upcoming third season.
* The partnership will include exclusive promotions, fan engagement opportunities, and community-driven activations.
* The third season of MLC will feature 34 matches across three venues: Dallas, Texas; Oakland, California; and Broward County, Florida.
* The league plans to expand to more cities in the coming years.
* The 2025 season of MLC will begin in June and will mark a significant expansion in the US market.
* Johnny Grave is the new chief executive of MLC, responsible for overseeing league expansion, team development, and strategic partnerships.

title: Major League Cricket (MLC) 2025 Player Draft: Full List of Picks, Retentions & Big Surprises
body:
The previous edition Champions Washington Freedom are ready to take on the San Francisco Unicorns in the upcoming season of the MLC. The match is scheduled to take place on June 12th at the Oakland Coliseum. The official administrators of the MLC 2025 have already revealed the complete fixtures, which are available on our website. One exciting aspect to look forward to is the lineup of Major League Cricket (MLC) 2025 Player selections.

In the forthcoming edition, six teams will compete for the third-season title. All six teams are ready with their squads and will give tough competition to the other five teams. Teams will play double round-robin games to face each other twice in the MLC 2025.

Three venues based in the United States will host 34 fixtures for the Major League Cricket third season. California, Florida, and Dallas are the three official venues of the Major League Cricket 2025 competition. The thrilling and high-voltage game final will take place at the Dallas Venue.

More Stuff:

Major League Cricket (MLC) 2025 Player complete list of Retained, Released, and picks list:

Before the latest season of Major League Cricket 2025 takes place, participating teams announce their retained players list. After announcing the retained players list, the team needs to pick a player from the remaining purse value. On the other hand, a few of the teams also release players from their squad.

Best Picks in MLC 2025 Drafts:

LA Knight Riders

Kartik Gattepalli

Sharad Lumba

Tajinder Singh Dhillon

Adam Khan

Shubham Ranjane

Washington Freedom

Retained and Released Players List of the Major League Cricket 2025 teams:

LA Knight Riders Team:

Retained: Ali Khan, Unkmukt Chand, Corne Dry, Saif Badar, Matthew Tromp, Spencer Johnson, Sunil Narine, Aditya Fanesh, Nitish Kumar, Shadley van Schalkwyk, Andre Russell.

Released: David Miller, Shakib Al Hasan, Alex Carey, Josh Little, Jason Roy, Adam Zampa, Drone Davis, and Waqar Salamkheil were released.

MI New York Team

Retained: Ehsan Adil, Monank Patel, Rashid Ugarkar, Kieron Pollard, Rashid Khan, Nosthush Kenjige, Heath Richards, Sunny Patel, Nicholas Pooran, Trent Boult.

Released: Dewald Brevis, Tim David, Ruben Clinton, Anrich Nortje, Steven Taylor, Romario Shepherd, Shayan Jahangir, and Kagiso Rabada.

San Francisco Unicorns

Retained: Corey Anderson, Liam Plunkett, Carmi Le Roux, Brody Couch, Juanoy Drysdale, Haris Rauf, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Hassan Khan, Karima Gore, Sanjay Krishnamurthi, Finn Allen, Matthew Short

Released: Pat Cummins, Abrar Ahmed, Jamar Hamilton, Tajinder Singh, Matt Henry, Josh Ingils, Wigan Mulder, Sherfane Rutherford.

Seattle Orcas Team:

Retained: Harmeet Singh, Ali Sheikh, Aaron Jones, Ryan Rickelton, Cameron Gannon, Ayan Desai, Heinrich Klassen

Released: Zaman Khan, Lungi Ngidi, Michael Bracewell, Keemo Paul, Shubham Ranjane, Hamad Azam, Nadeem Burger, Quinton de Kock, Imad Wasim, Nauman Anwar.

Texas Super Kings Team

Retained: Joshua Tromp, Milind Kumar, Zia-ul-Haq, Faf du Plessis, Noor Ahmed, Calvin Savage, Mohammad Mohsin, Saiteja Mukkamalla, Devon Conway, Marcus Stoinis.

Released: Ottnell Baartman, Zia Shahzad, Mitchell Santner, Aiden Markram, Naveen-ul-Haq, Raj Nannan, Dwayne Bravo, Aaron Hardie.

Washington Freedom Team:

Retained: Angriest Fous, Obus Piennar, Ian Holland, Justin Dill, Yasir Mohammed, Glenn Maxwell, Rachin Ravindra, Jack Edwards, Mukhtar Ahmed, Saurabh Netravalkar, Amila Aponso, Lahiri Milantha, Marco Jansen, Lockie Ferguson, Steven Smith
summary:
**Match Schedule:** The upcoming season of MLC 2025 will kick off with a match between the Washington Freedom and the San Francisco Unicorns on June 12th at the Oakland Coliseum.

**Tournament Format:** Six teams will compete in the third season of MLC, playing double round-robin games to face each other twice. The finals will take place at the Dallas venue.

**Venues:** The tournament will be held across three venues in the United States: California, Florida, and Dallas.

**Team Squads:** All six teams have announced their retained players, released players, and new picks for the MLC 2025 season. The article provides a detailed list of the players for each team, including LA Knight Riders, MI New York, San Francisco Unicorns, Seattle Orcas, Texas Super Kings, and Washington Freedom.

title: Major League Cricket 2025 Points Table – Current Standings, Top Teams & Results
body:
The third and thrilling season of the Major League Cricket T20 Competition is set to take place in June 2025. So, cricket fans from the host country are eagerly waiting for the forthcoming season. Also, the participating teams are gearing up to take on opponents in the upcoming season, and keeping an eye on the Major League Cricket 2025 Points Table will be crucial for tracking their progress.

American Cricket Enterprises will oversee the third season and expand it to 34 matches. In the previous season, a total of 25 matches, including the knockouts and final game, took place. Therefore, the forthcoming edition of MLC 2025 will begin on June 12th and run until July 13th, 2025.

More Stuff:

In the forthcoming season, Washington Freedom will defend its title against the other five teams. Fans are likely to witness high-voltage and thrilling competition in the forthcoming season of Major League Cricket 2025.

Major League Cricket 2025 Points table- current standings

The schedule for the third season has yet to begin, so the latest updates regarding the current standings will be available later. Currently, Washington Freedom is standing in the top position as they claimed the previous season’s title.

Major League Cricket 2025 Points Distribution Rules:

In the Major League Cricket 2025, teams that win the match in the round-robin stage will receive two points. Whereas each team will receive 1 point in case the match is drawn or a draw. The points are very crucial, as they will decide which top two teams will advance to the Qualifier and Eliminator match of MLC 2025.

Complete fixtures and schedule details of the Major League Season 3rd:
summary:
**Season Details**

* The 3rd season of the Major League Cricket T20 Competition will take place in June 2025.
* The tournament will consist of 34 matches, an increase from 25 matches in the previous season.
* The season will run from June 12th to July 13th, 2025.

**Participating Teams**

* Washington Freedom will defend its title against five other teams.
* The team is currently standing in the top position after claiming the previous season's title.

**Points System**

* Teams will receive 2 points for a win in the round-robin stage.
* Teams will receive 1 point in case of a draw or a tied match.
* The points will determine which top two teams will advance to the Qualifier and Eliminator match.

**Schedule**

* The complete fixtures and schedule details for the 3rd season of Major League Cricket will be released later.
* The current standings will be updated once the season begins.

title: Major League Cricket 2025 Teams Squad: Captains, Complete Players List
body:
The Major League Cricket 2025 (MLC 2025) is an upcoming Twenty20 cricket championship in America. It will mark the third edition of the MLC championship. The tournament will start on 12 June 2025, last for a month, and conclude on 13 July 2025. Six teams will be participating in this major championship.

The league will follow a double round-robin format and showcase thirty-four matches. There will be thirty league stage games and three playoff matches, which will lead to the final match. The playoff games branch into three key matches: the Qualifier, Eliminator and Challenger.

The top two teams are selected for the Qualifier. The winner advances directly to the finals, whereas the loser waits at the Challenger stage. Next up is the Eliminator stage match between the 3rd and 4th teams. The winner receives an opportunity to play one more match and reach the finals, whereas the loser gets knocked out.

The Challenger match is between the loser of the Qualifier and the winner of the Eliminator. It’s the ultimate game to decide the second finalist for the tournament. All these matches will take place across three venues in three cities: Texas, Florida and California.

Major League Cricket 2025 Teams Squad: Captains, Complete Players List

In the debut season of Major League Cricket, MI New York won the championship after defeating the Seattle Orcas. They had a target of 184 and scored exactly that in just 16 overs.

The 2024 MLC was a witness to Washington Freedom’s championship victory. They had set a target of 207 runs in 20 overs, and San Francisco Unicorns could not achieve it. Instead, they were all out at 111 runs in 16 overs.

Also Read: Major League Cricket 2025 Schedule, Start Date, Venues, Teams List, Squads, League stage & Play-offs

MI New York dropped from first to fourth, and Washington rose from fourth to first. San Francisco climbed from fifth to second, whereas Seattle fell from second to last. Los Angeles could manage to rise from sixth to fifth.

The most consistent team in Major League Cricket is the Texas Super Kings. They’ve been at third rank in the two seasons of the MLC.

Major League Cricket 2025 Captains

Four out of six teams have decided on their captains. However, the Seattle Orcas and Washington Freedom teams are yet to determine their captains.

We can see that the 2024 Major League Cricket captains are once again leading their teams this year. Wayne Parnell and Steve Smith led the Seattle Orcas and Washington Freedom the previous year,

Steve Smith is in Washington Freedom again this year, so he may be elected captain again. Wayne Parnell is not part of Seattle Orcas, so they’ll look for other candidates.

The potential candidates for the Seattle Orcas captains are Ryan Rickelton and Heinrich Klaasen.

Major League Cricket 2025: Completed Players List

The teams have 12 to 16 players in the squad. Seattle Orcas and Los Angeles have only twelve, the least number of players among all the teams.

The MI New York and San Francisco Unicorns have fourteen players, whereas the Texas Super Kings have thirteen. Washington Freedom has the most players in their squad (sixteen).
summary:
**Tournament Details**

* The Major League Cricket 2025 (MLC 2025) is the third edition of the championship, starting on June 12, 2025, and concluding on July 13, 2025.
* Six teams will participate in the tournament, which will follow a double round-robin format with 34 matches, including 30 league stage games and three playoff matches.

**Format**

* The top two teams will qualify for the Qualifier, with the winner advancing directly to the finals and the loser proceeding to the Challenger stage.
* The Eliminator stage will feature the 3rd and 4th teams, with the winner advancing to the Challenger stage and the loser getting knocked out.
* The Challenger match will determine the second finalist.

**Venues**

* The tournament will take place across three venues in three cities: Texas, Florida, and California.

**Teams and Captains**

* The six participating teams are: MI New York, Seattle Orcas, Washington Freedom, San Francisco Unicorns, Texas Super Kings, and Los Angeles.
* Four teams have announced their captains, while Seattle Orcas and Washington Freedom are yet to decide theirs.
* Steve Smith is likely to continue as the captain of Washington Freedom.

**Squads**

* The teams have between 12 to 16 players in their squads, with Washington Freedom having the most players (16) and Seattle Orcas and Los Angeles having the least (12).

title: San Francisco Unicorns Squad 2025: Full Player List, Retentions, Signings, Owners, Schedule and much more
body:
The runner-up of the Major League Cricket 2024 season looks forward to claiming the title for the third season. In the previous season, the San Francisco Unicorns gave a tough fight throughout the tournament. Whereas, they managed to reach the Maiden finals of the MLC T20 Competition. So, check out this article for San Francisco Unicorns Squad 2025: Full Player List, Retentions, Signings, Owners, Schedule, and much more.

The San Francisco Unicorns will play the opening game against the Washington Freedom on June 12th. In the first game itself, they will encounter the Victors of the MLC 2024 season. Fans are expecting tough competition between the previous season’s finalists.

Corey Anderson is set to continue leading the San Francisco Unicorns squad. He is a very talented cricketer who has also represented the New Zealand national side in his career. Meanwhile, along with Anderson, a few more players were added to the team to strengthen the squad.

More Stuff:

San Francisco Unicorns Squad 2025: Complete players list

The official organizers have already revealed the team squad of the San Francisco Unicorns for MLC 2025. Here we have the complete list. The team looks strong and can face every opponent in the Major League Cricket 2025.

Captain: Corey Anderson

Squad: Finn Allen, Juanoy Drysdale, Karima Gore, Sanjay Krishnamurthi, Liam Plunkett, Matthew Short, Achilles Browne, Brody Couch, Jake Fraser-Mcgurk, Hassan Khan, Carmi le Roux, Haris Rauf, Hammad Azam.

Retained and Signing players list of the San Francisco Unicorns Team 2025:

For the latest season of the Major League Cricket 2025, SFU has retained the talented Cricketers. The International players Haris Rauf, Finn Allen, Matthew Short, and Jake Fraser-McGurk will again represent the team. On the other hand, a few more domestic players will continue representing the SFU team.

Jake Fraser-McGurk

Haris Rauf

Finn Allen

Matthew Short

Corey Anderson

Owner details of the San Francisco Unicorns 2025:

The co-founders of Cambrian Ventures and Kosmix own the San Francisco Unicorns team. Venky Harinarayn and Anand Rajaraman have been associated with the team since its Inauguration. So, the team is all set to play its home games at Oakland Stadium in the MLC 2025 season.

San Francisco Unicorns 2025 MLC Schedule:
summary:
**Team:** San Francisco Unicorns
**Season:** 2025
**Captain:** Corey Anderson
**Squad:** 13 players, including Finn Allen, Juanoy Drysdale, Karima Gore, Sanjay Krishnamurthi, Liam Plunkett, Matthew Short, Achilles Browne, Brody Couch, Jake Fraser-Mcgurk, Hassan Khan, Carmi le Roux, Haris Rauf, and Hammad Azam.
**Retained and Signed Players:** International players Haris Rauf, Finn Allen, Matthew Short, Jake Fraser-McGurk, and others will continue to represent the team.
**Owner:** Co-founders of Cambrian Ventures and Kosmix, Venky Harinarayn and Anand Rajaraman, own the team.
**Schedule:** The team will play the opening game against Washington Freedom on June 12th, followed by other matches to be announced.
**Background:** The San Francisco Unicorns were the runner-up of the Major League Cricket 2024 season and are looking to claim the title in the upcoming season.
